entry.title: Hello World
entry.content:
‘If you didn’t document it, it didn’t happen.’

Someone said this to me recently, and it made me uncomfortable because I knew it was true.

I stopped blogging 6 years ago when I returned to Australia from Japan, because I felt that I didn’t have anything interesting to say, and because it freed up more time for getting things done. I probably have less free time now than I did before, but let the documentation begin…
